qualityGeneration.comment: Quality count probabilities are tier-independent. Level distribution still uses tier-based weights. levelDamping (0-1) shifts probabilities toward lower levels - 0.6 means moderate damping, making L1-L2 more common.

traitGeneration.comment: Reduced from previous rates (common: 5%, uncommon: 15%, rare: 30%, epic: 50%) to make traits more special
